Original: 天母最棒的調酒吧！氣味、氣氛、調酒品質、食物值得再訪！
EN: The best bartender bar of Tianmu!Smell, atmosphere, alcoholic quality, food worth visiting!

Original:
在離家不到公車半站距離的地方開了一間不錯的餐酒館，對我而言簡直是天大的好事（笑）！其實這裡之前是什麼店我還真沒印象（因為常常在換，習以為常）。會發現這間店，起因是前陣子晚上運動回家路過、翻了翻門口的菜單，才發現這是間新店啊～東西好吃酒好喝而且老闆和Bartender人都不錯，老闆還不時會在店內舉杯與客人互乾，令人喝得很開心。
我這個土生土長在地人在很多年前跑到城中西門一帶念大學時，才知道中山北路七段這一帶當年普遍被認為是郊外（笑），的確這裡接近天母的公車總站，雖然不像許多公車總站位於荒郊野外，但也真的很安靜；加上這幾年天母的沒落使得許多店家不是提早打烊就是關門大吉，能有一間夜間營業的餐酒館，（愛喝酒的）在地人表示好感動哇。
EN:
It is a good thing for me to open a good dining tavern in the place where I leave the bus halfway away from the bus from home. It is a good thing for me (laughs)!In fact, I really didn't impress what shop here (because I often change it, is accustomed to it).I will find that this shop is because I went home to pass home and passed through the menu at night before I found that this is a new store ~ ​​It is delicious and delicious, and the boss and Bartender are good. The store's toasting to the guests is very happy to drink.
When I was born and native, when the local people ran to the west gate in the city many years ago, I learned that the area of ​​the seventh section of Zhongshan North Road was generally considered to be the suburbs (laughs). It is indeed close to the bus terminal of Tianmu. The bus terminal is located in the wilderness, but it is really quiet. In addition, the decline of Tianmu in recent years has made many stores either closing early or closing the door. There can be a restaurant that is open at night. So touched.

EN: The wine servant is very kind and can discuss the items you want to try. Although there are not many wines, some classics are available.I ordered Damo's 12 years of Shirley three barrels and Tyllisca 10 years & Abbe 10 years, all of them drinking ice cubes.

Original:
酒很好喝、東西很好吃、氣氛也不錯。

美中不足的是，上周第一次去(之前外帶餐點也是很滿意)，陪失戀的朋友聊天，我點了三杯酒，只有第一杯"記得"給我，第二杯我等好久，bartender都在聊天了，我問之後才做給我。第三杯我點了以後，一直到我們都想結帳，還沒給我，最後決定不等要結帳，才發現又忘了(但酒已key入帳單)。

可能我朋友失戀，我們的corner成為一個陰暗的角落，所以容易被遺忘。但我真的很想多喝幾杯再回家......

希望以後可以被記得。
EN:
The wine is delicious, the things are delicious, and the atmosphere is also good.

The disadvantage of the beauty is that the first time I went to the first time (the meal was also very satisfied). I chatted with friends who lost love. I ordered three glasses of wine. Bartender is chatting, and I will do it for me after asking.After I ordered the third cup, until we all wanted to check out, before we gave me, I finally decided not to wait for the checkout, and I found that I forgot (but the wine has been in the bill).

Maybe my friend is in love, and our Corner has become a dark corner, so it is easy to be forgotten.But I really want to drink a few more cups and go home ...

Hope to be remembered in the future.
